name: skelets
description:
skelets is a local multiplayer skeleton brawler. Plunder gems as you fight other skeletons. Use different weapons to dig into the terrain and collect your treasure. First to steal all the diamonds wins!

Features
  • Play against AI in singleplayer campaign mode
  • Play with up to 4 players in local multiplayer
  • 5 unlockable levels with destructible terrain to battle on
  • 7 different weapons to use
  • Banger soundtrack


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
